channel.title: Making Stamina
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Making Stamina" - Free stamina trick.

item.title: Re: Making Stamina
item.content:encoded: This trick only works if you village has both Quiet Glade and Hiking Rest Stop, since the Knapsack only gives back 10 Stamina a day. So the first time would give you 15 stamina and subsequent ones would give you 5 stamina.

item.title: Making Stamina
item.content:encoded:
I just noticed that I made stamina.

By having in team Mister Tea(+5 stamina in Special Mission) and Miss Kitty lvl 2(+10 stamina in Special Mission) and doing Ingredient Hunt(in village with upgrades giving back stamina for hunt) I made 15 stamina points.

It's nothing special but for people desperate for stamina and a lot of Arena Points you can make this work.
